content: संसिद्धिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Completion, complete accomplishment or attainment; स्वनुष्ठितस्य धर्मस्य संसिद्धिर्हरितोषणं <ls>Bhāg.</ls>; <ls>Ku. 2. 63.</ls> {@--2@} Absolution, final beatitude; संसिद्धिं परमां गताः <ls>Bg. 8. 15</ls>; <ls n="Bg.">3. 20.</ls> {@--3@} Nature, natural disposition, state or quality. {@--4@} A passionate or intoxicated woman.
